list_definition.mean_english: sự nhắc lại; sự tái diễn

list_ex_of_english: I wanted to make these repetitions apparent to the audience; therefore, an automatic response determined by the location of the transmitter was not suitable.
To control for run-down of the response, the lowest and highest intensity stimuli were bracketed by two repetitions of the intermediate intensity.
The level of small, local detail between these repetitions is progressively increased.
Repetitions that did not correct a child's error or revise the child's well-formed speech were coded as non-corrective repetitions.
Where possible, full or partial repetitions or imitations were also excluded.
In the following we will identify all signatures which represent the same set of pairs (that is, order and repetitions are immaterial).
The guitars and bass riff can be grouped into four repetitions of measures in 7/8, followed by a measure in 4/8.
Each subject produced three repetitions of each item.
